Text: RE REVISED SQL SP JDP MOU Cc Tana Id prefer to work this at a lower level if possible Could we get either Richard Burchfield or Beth Perlman to sign the MOU Bob Ward Manager IT ext Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Wednesday June AM To Bolender Corinna Cc Ward Bob Opalko John Greenberg Mark Subject RE REVISED SQL SP JDP MOU This has been sent down to Phillippe Bibi for signature I have not receiv ed the signed copy back from Phillippe yet Corinna nronXgate AM To Mark NRON Tana CT cc SQL nronXgate Bob nronXgate John nronXgate Subject RE REVISED SQL SP JDP MOU Has this been signed and sent to Microsoft Original Message From Greenberg Mark Sent Tuesday June AM To Bolender Corinna Cc Jones Tana Subject Re FW REVISED SQL SP JDP MOU Corinna I have looked at the attached It is fine I will be printing two origina ls for Net Works signature Ill have them sent down for signature so that they can then be sent to Microsoft Mark Senior Counsel EWS Phone Facsimile EMail Corinna nronXgate PM To Mark NRON cc Charles nronXgate John nronXgate Jim nronXgate Bob nronXgat e nronXgate nronXgate nronXgate Subject FW REVISED SQL SP JDP MOU Mark Can you please review the changes made by Susan Chang at Microsoft to the S QL SP JDP MOU for our Unify application Bob Ward is out of the office until June th and this application is going into production on June th We need to ensure the MOU is finalized and signed prior to going into production so that we can receive the appropriate support from Microsoft wh en we go live If you need to contact Susan her telephone number is Her ema il is Thanks for your immediate attention to this matter Corinna Bolender Desk Cell Original Message From James Morris ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESJamesMorrisCjammomicrosoftEcomEE NRO NRONcom Sent Thursday May PM To Corinna Bolender Bolender Corinna Ward Bob Subject FW REVISED SQL SP JDP MOU Bob and Corinna Here are the versions of the MOU your lawyer will need to review As expected some of the items just did not make the bar to warrant a change Specifically an actual date for the released product will not go on the MOU Customers who particpate in the JDP have a high degree of touch and disclosure with MS Although we are glad to discuss dates and they draw near with the customer we do not promise anything from the beginning though this hardly matters now considering the date The line in that was cut and pasted to has been placed back in This is due to the placement of the topic in The rest of specifically stating that there is NO COST TO THE CUSTOMER has been left in on and Ill probably incorporate this for future use It is a good addition on Microsofts section has been removed It is clearly rednundant and not necessary We already say there is absolutely no cost to the customer If this is agreeable I have included the red lined version so your lawyers can review the final version with those changes have also been included Please print sign and return Thanks JamMo Original Message From Susan Chang LCA Sent Thursday May PM To James Morris Cc Susan Chang LCA Subject REVISED SQL SP JDP MOU James per our phone call this afternoon Ive revised the MOU Attached is the redlined version as well as the final doc Please let me know if you have any questions Susan Original Message From James Morris Sent Monday May PM To Susan Chang LCA Subject FW SQL SP JDP MOU Susan I would like to permanently modify our MOU to the following for our Joint Development Programs It is redlined so you can review the exact changes This is actually from the customer but I like what they changed and added I just want to be certain that its not going to come back and bite me later Roughly or sentenced Thanks for you help Original Message From Ward Bob mailtoBob NRONcom Sent Tuesday May AM To James Morris Cc Bolender Corinna Ogg Jim Subject SQL SP JDP MOU Hi James Ive attached a copy of the MOU which contains some minor changes suggested by one of our attorneys Let me know what you think Thank you JDP MOU microsoft enroncommentdoc Bob Ward Manager IT Development ext JDP MOU microsoft enroncommentdoc File JDP MOU microsoft enroncommentdoc SQL SP JDP MOUdoc File SQL SP JDP MOUdoc

RE REVISED SQL SP JDP MOUto the first paragraph of the MOU it is not a legally enforc eable agreement It appears however that were treating it as if it is My concern is that were putting a system into production this weekend that runs on SP and Id feel better about Microsofts willingness to support u s if we can get the MOU signed beforehand I dont know Philippe and I dont know if and when the MOU will be signed Is someone from your organization plannin g to follow up with him Bob Ward Manager IT Development ext Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Wednesday June PM To Ward Bob Subject RE REVISED SQL SP JDP MOU Company policy and corporate organizational documents dictates that ALL contracts may only be executed by an officer at the Vice President level or above I checked the Corporate Secretarys Records and they indicate that neither Beth Perlman nor Richard Burchfield meet such requirements for Enro n Net Works Mark Greenberg directed me to get the agreement executed by Phillippe Bibi Other officers we frequently get Networks agreements executed by are David Berberian Managing Director Greg Piper Managing Director and Chief Operating Officer Rex Shelby Managing Director or And y Zipper Vice President If it relates to Commodity Logic we can go to Tom Gros Vice President Feel free to approach any of this slate of officers to get your documents executed Bob nronXgate PM To Tana CT cc Corinna nronXgate Mark NRON John nronXgate Subject RE REVISED SQL SP JDP MOU Hi Tana Id prefer to work this at a lower level if possible Could we get either Richard Burchfield or Beth Perlman to sign the MOU Bob Ward Manager IT ext Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Wednesday June AM To Bolender Corinna Cc Ward Bob Opalko John Greenberg Mark Subject RE REVISED SQL SP JDP MOU FW SP JDP MOU Signed Cc Please send a signed copy of the MOU to James Morris at the address below By the way who signed the it Thank you Bob Ward Manager IT Development ext Original Message From James Morris mailto Sent Thursday June PM To Ward Bob Cc Bolender Corinna Ogg Jim Subject RE SP JDP MOU Signed Hey guys Send it to Microsoft Way Bldg rm Redmond WA Thanks Original Message From Ward Bob mailtoBob NRONcom Sent Thursday June AM To James Morris Cc Bolender Corinna Ogg Jim Subject SP JDP MOU Signed James We have a signed copy of the MOU ready to send to you I need your address Thank you Bob Ward Manager IT Development ext

RE FW SP JDP MOU Signed Cc Beth Perlman is a VP of Enron Corp thats why I suggested s he sign the MOU instead of Philippe in my email to you yesterday I dont under stand your emphasis on the word is Bob Ward Manager IT Development ext Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Thursday June PM To Ward Bob Cc Greenberg Mark Subject Re FW SP JDP MOU Signed Beth Perlman who IS a VP of Enron Corp Bob nronXgate PM To Mark NRON cc Corinna nronXgate Tana CT Jim nronXgate Subject FW SP JDP MOU Signed Mark Please send a signed copy of the MOU to James Morris at the address below By the way who signed the it Thank you Bob Ward Manager IT Development ext Original Message From James Morris mailto Sent Thursday June PM To Ward Bob Cc Bolender Corinna Ogg Jim Subject RE SP JDP MOU Signed Hey guys Send it to Microsoft Way Bldg rm Redmond WA Thanks Original Message From Ward Bob mailtoBob NRONcom Sent Thursday June AM To James Morris Cc Bolender Corinna Ogg Jim Subject SP JDP MOU Signed James We have a signed copy of the MOU ready to send to you I need your address Thank you Bob Ward Manager IT Development ext

not make the bar to warrant a change Specifically an actual date for the released product will not go on the MOU Customers who particpate in the JDP have a high degree of touch and disclosure with MS Although we are glad to discuss dates and they draw near with the customer we do not promise anything from the beginning though this hardly matters now considering the date The line in that was cut and pasted to has been placed back in This is due to the placement of the topic in The rest of specifically stating that there is NO COST TO THE CUSTOMER has been left in on and Ill probably incorporate this for future use It is a good addition on Microsofts section has been removed It is clearly rednundant and not necessary We already say there is absolutely no cost to the customer If this is agreeable I have included the red lined version so your lawyers can review the final version with those changes have also been included Please print sign and return Thanks JamMo Original
